profile.title: Profile
profile.profileTextFirstParagraph: I have been working in the IT field since 2015, first as an IT intern at the South-Savo rescue department, where I also later worked as an IT specialist. Since October 2017, I have been working at Trimble Forestry on various forest systems. Through my work experience, I have become familiar with, for example, WPF application development and Web development. I have versatile experience in frontend and backend development.
profile.profileTextSeconsParagraph: I am calm, conscientious and systematic. I value teamwork and get along well with different people. With several years of remote work experience, independent work also comes naturally to me. I am curious and want to develop myself, and I fully commit to my work tasks.

workExperience.title: Work experience
workExperience.forestSystemsDevelopment: Development of forest systems (.NET, C#, WPF, DevExpress, ReSharper, Entity Framework, Angular/TypeScript)
workExperience.southSavoRescueDepartment2017Description: Development of WebGL games (Unity and C#), programming various small Windows Form applications (C#), creation of CBRNE animations (Unity, Blender), intranet maintenance, IT support tasks, etc.
workExperience.southSavoRescueDepartment2016Description: Development of leadership training application (Unity and C#), development and maintenance of intranet (SharePoint Online, SharePoint Designer, HTML, CSS, JavaScript & jQuery), other office work and IT support tasks, etc.
workExperience.southSavoRescueDepartment2015Description: Development and maintenance of the intranet (SharePoint Online, SharePoint Designer, HTML, CSS, JavaScript & jQuery), development of the intranet mobile version (SharePoint Online, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, jQuery), other office work and IT support tasks.

educationAndLanguage.businessInformationTechnology: Bachelor of Business Administration, Business Information Technology
educationAndLanguage.southEasternUniversity: South-Eastern Finland University of Applied Sciences
